County Sligo is looking good today with 4 ft @ 8s NNW swell and light 11 mph S winds. Dunmoran Strand and Easkey Left are your best bets, both offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, expect 6 ft @ 8s NNW with fresh 20 mph NNW winds, making it blown out across the board. On the day after, conditions improve again with 5 ft @ 9s NW and light 9 mph WSW winds, making for fun surf at spots like Dunmoran Strand and Easkey Left. Best: today.
